00030 
00031 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LQUOTA
00032 
00033 #include <obd_class.h>
00034 #include <lustre_param.h>
00035 
00036 #include "qsd_internal.h"
00037 
00038 static struct list_head qfs_list = LIST_HEAD_INIT(qfs_list);
00039 /* protect the qfs_list */
00040 static DEFINE_SPINLOCK(qfs_list_lock);
00041 
00042 /*
00043  * Put reference of qsd_fsinfo.
00044  *
00045  * \param  qfs    - the qsd_fsinfo to be put
00046  */
00047 void qsd_put_fsinfo(struct qsd_fsinfo *qfs)
00048 {
00049         ENTRY;
00050         LASSERT(qfs != NULL);
00051 
00052         spin_lock(&qfs_list_lock);
00053         LASSERT(qfs->qfs_ref > 0);
00054         qfs->qfs_ref--;
00055         if (qfs->qfs_ref == 0) {
00056                 LASSERT(list_empty(&qfs->qfs_qsd_list));
00057                 list_del(&qfs->qfs_link);
00058                 OBD_FREE_PTR(qfs);
00059         }
00060         spin_unlock(&qfs_list_lock);
00061         EXIT;
00062 }
00063 
00064 /*
00065  * Find or create a qsd_fsinfo
00066  *
00067  * \param  name   - filesystem name
00068  * \param  create - when @create is non-zero, create new one if fail to
00069  *                  find existing qfs by @name
00070  *
00071  * \retval qsd_fsinfo - success
00072  * \retval NULL          - failure
00073  */
00074 struct qsd_fsinfo *qsd_get_fsinfo(char *name, bool create)
00075 {
00076         struct qsd_fsinfo       *qfs, *new = NULL;
00077         ENTRY;
00078 
00079         if (name == NULL ||  strlen(name) >= MTI_NAME_MAXLEN)
00080                 RETURN(NULL);
00081 
00082         if (create) {
00083                 /* pre-allocate a qsd_fsinfo in case there isn't one already.
00084                  * we can afford the extra cost since qsd_get_fsinfo() isn't
00085                  * called very often with create = true */
00086 
00087                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(new);
00088                 if (new == NULL)
00089                         RETURN(NULL);
00090 
00091                 mutex_init(&new->qfs_mutex);
00092                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&new->qfs_qsd_list);
00093                 strcpy(new->qfs_name, name);
00094                 new->qfs_ref = 1;
00095         }
00096 
00097         /* search in the fsinfo list */
00098         spin_lock(&qfs_list_lock);
00099         list_for_each_entry(qfs, &qfs_list, qfs_link) {
00100                 if (!strcmp(qfs->qfs_name, name)) {
00101                         qfs->qfs_ref++;
00102                         goto out;
00103                 }
00104         }
00105 
00106         qfs = NULL; /* not found */
00107 
00108         if (new) {
00109                 /* not found, but we were asked to create a new one */
00110                 list_add_tail(&new->qfs_link, &qfs_list);
00111                 qfs = new;
00112                 new = NULL;
00113         }
00114 out:
00115         spin_unlock(&qfs_list_lock);
00116 
00117         if (new)
00118                 OBD_FREE_PTR(new);
00119         RETURN(qfs);
00120 }
00121 
00122 /*
00123  * Quota configuration handlers in charge of processing all per-filesystem quota
00124  * parameters set via conf_param.
00125  *
00126  * \param lcfg - quota configuration log to be processed
00127  */
00128 int qsd_process_config(struct lustre_cfg *lcfg)
00129 {
00130         struct qsd_fsinfo       *qfs;
00131         char                    *fsname = lustre_cfg_string(lcfg, 0);
00132         char                    *cfgstr = lustre_cfg_string(lcfg, 1);
00133         char                    *keystr, *valstr;
00134         int                      rc, pool, enabled = 0;
00135         bool                     reint = false;
00136         ENTRY;
00137 
00138         CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "processing quota parameter: fs:%s cfgstr:%s\n", fsname,
00139                cfgstr);
00140 
00141         if (class_match_param(cfgstr, PARAM_QUOTA, &keystr) != 0)
00142                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00143 
00144         if (!class_match_param(keystr, QUOTA_METAPOOL_NAME, &valstr))
00145                 pool = LQUOTA_RES_MD;
00146         else if (!class_match_param(keystr, QUOTA_DATAPOOL_NAME, &valstr))
00147                 pool = LQUOTA_RES_DT;
00148         else
00149                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00150 
00151         qfs = qsd_get_fsinfo(fsname, 0);
00152         if (qfs == NULL) {
00153                 CERROR("failed to find quota filesystem information for %s\n",
00154                        fsname);
00155                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
00156         }
00157 
00158         if (strchr(valstr, 'u'))
00159                 enabled |= 1 << USRQUOTA;
00160         if (strchr(valstr, 'g'))
00161                 enabled |= 1 << GRPQUOTA;
00162 
00163         mutex_lock(&qfs->qfs_mutex);
00164         if (qfs->qfs_enabled[pool - LQUOTA_FIRST_RES] == enabled)
00165                 /* no change required */
00166                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00167 
00168         if ((qfs->qfs_enabled[pool - LQUOTA_FIRST_RES] & enabled) != enabled)
00169                 reint = true;
00170 
00171         qfs->qfs_enabled[pool - LQUOTA_FIRST_RES] = enabled;
00172 
00173         /* trigger reintegration for all qsd */
00174         if (reint) {
00175                 struct qsd_instance     *qsd;
00176                 struct qsd_qtype_info   *qqi;
00177 
00178                 list_for_each_entry(qsd, &qfs->qfs_qsd_list, qsd_link) {
00179                         bool    skip = false;
00180                         int     type;
00181 
00182                         /* start reintegration only if qsd_prepare() was
00183                          * successfully called */
00184                         read_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00185                         if (!qsd->qsd_prepared)
00186                                 skip = true;
00187                         read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00188                         if (skip)
00189                                 continue;
00190                         if (qsd->qsd_acct_failed) {
00191                                 LCONSOLE_ERROR("%s: can't enable quota "
00192                                                "enforcement since space "
00193                                                "accounting isn't functional. "
00194                                                "Please run tunefs.lustre "
00195                                                "--quota on an unmounted "
00196                                                "filesystem if not done already"
00197                                                "\n", qsd->qsd_svname);
00198                                 continue;
00199                         }
00200 
00201                         for (type = USRQUOTA; type < MAXQUOTAS; type++) {
00202                                 qqi = qsd->qsd_type_array[type];
00203                                 qsd_start_reint_thread(qqi);
00204                         }
00205                 }
00206         }
00207 out:
00208         mutex_unlock(&qfs->qfs_mutex);
00209         qsd_put_fsinfo(qfs);
00210         RETURN(0);
00211 }
